T02D2436:49a-1: k'a ru na ka p'a la tsarya: drishti n'a ma /
T02D2436:49a-3: snying rje spyod pa thod pa'i lta ba zhes bya ba /
T02D2436:49a-4: dpal bde mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2436:49a-5: nam mkhar gser gyi yu ba can //
T02D2436:49a-6: gdugs steng mgo la 'dzin nas gnas //
T02D2436:49a-7: rdo rje mkha' 'gro gshegs par mdzod //
T02D2436:49a-8: bha ri mkha' 'gro ma yi sras //
T02D2436:49a-9: ci phyir zhen de yi ni //
T02D2436:49a-10: drin gyis rnal 'byor bsam pa grub //
T02D2436:49a-11: stong nyid kham phor lag tu thogs //
T02D2436:49a-12: thabs kyi khu bas bkang byas nas//
T02D2436:49a-13: sangs rgyas zhing du phyin te gnas //
T02D2436:49a-14: srid gsum bcing ba rtsad nas bcad //
T02D2436:49a-15: mkha' 'gro ma brgyad rtag tu bsrungs //
T02D2436:49a-16: sgo bcu dag ni rgya yis btab //
T02D2436:49a-17: dha ri ka ni smra bar byed //
T02D2436:49a-18: kun la khyab kyang gcig gis ni //
T02D2436:49a-19: de yi mtshan nyid rtog med na //
T02D2436:49a-20: bdag gis ji ltar bstan par byas //
T02D2436:49a-21: dha ri mkha' 'gro ma yi sras //
T02D2436:49a-22: ci phyir zhe na de yi ni //
T02D2436:49a-24: snying rje thod pa spyod pa'i lta ba zhes bya
T02D2436:49a-25: ba slob dpon dha ri ka pa nas brgyud pa
